title: Request to NASA for list of 2018 film and TV collaborations

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A list of all documentaries, feature films, and TV programs supported by NASA in the year 2018. NASA has previously released such lists of media collaborations for other years, including to this requester, who has made them public.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: Request to US Marshals for all production assistance agreements with entertainment industry

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All production assistance agreements, or related formal agreements, signed between the United States Marshals Service and any entertainment media production company, within the records retention schedule(s) of the relevant offices. I request a search of any and all offices where such documents may be found, including the communications HQ and entertainment liaison office, or similar offices.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: Request to NARA for all references to 1986 Oliver Stone film "Salvador" in State Department documents

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all references to the 1986 movie "Salvador," directed by Oliver Stone, in State Department records from the era (approximately 1983-1988). This would include all communications between the State Dept. and the cast, crew, and production company of "Salvador."

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: Request to NARA for all communications between the CIA and Arnon Milchan

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All communications between the CIA and Hollywood producer Arnon Milchan, born on December 6, 1944, in Rehovot, Mandatory Palestine (now Israel).  Such communications may include, but should not be limited to, emails, correspondence, memos, and transcriptions of telephone calls.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: Request to National Archives for all communications between the FBI and author Thomas Harris

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All communications between the FBI and Thomas Harris (born William Thomas Harris III, on September 22, 1940, in Jackson, Tennessee), author of "Silence of the Lambs."  Such communications may include, but should not be limited to, emails, correspondence, memos, and transcriptions of telephone calls.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. To Whom It May Concern:

title: Request to CIA for all communications with Mark Wahlberg

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Request to CIA for all communications with Mark Wahlberg
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All communications between the Central Intelligence Agency or employees thereof and Hollywood actor Mark Wahlberg (born June 5, 1971, in Boston, Massachusetts) within the record retention schedule(s) for such documents within the relevant office(s). Such communications may include, but should not be limited to, emails, correspondence, memos, and transcriptions of telephone calls.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: Request to CIA for all communications with screenwriter David Guggenheim

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Request to CIA for all communications with screenwriter David Guggenheim
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All communications between the Central Intelligence Agency or employees thereof and Hollywood screewriter David Guggenheim (born in Long Island, New York) within the record retention schedule(s) for such documents within the relevant office(s). Such communications may include, but should not be limited to, emails, correspondence, memos, and transcriptions of telephone calls. Mr. Guggenheim's credits include "Safe House" (2012) and "The Union" (2014).

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo
